project-1.title: Interactive Year Review — Web Experience
project-1.overview: Large-scale, consumer-facing web experience visualizing a personalized year in review, with a focus on interaction, motion, and intuitive UI behavior.
project-1.interactionMotion: Subtle motion cues, progressive reveals, and scroll-based storytelling were used to guide users through the experience in a calm and responsive way.
project-1.note: The content shown is based on anonymized screen recordings and a prototype to respect confidentiality.
project-1.contentMobile: This project was part of a large-scale, consumer-facing web experience designed to visualize a personalized year in review. My focus was on interaction, motion, and translating visual concepts into smooth, intuitive UI behavior.
project-1.altText: Screenshot of the Interactive Year Review web experience

project-2.title: Interactive Product Experience — Automotive Web Platform
project-2.overview: Interactive, motion-driven product experience for a high-end consumer website, focused on frontend prototyping, component development, and CMS integration.
myRole: Interactive prototypes for reusable UI components
Interactive components for product lines and configurations
Component and logic integration into a CMS
project-2.interactionMotion: Motion and scrolling guided users through complex product content in a fluid, immersive, and performance-aware way.
project-2.techStack: Twig.js | Vanilla JavaScript | GSAP | SCSS | Storybook | Pimcore CMS
project-2.note: The live website is publicly accessible. The work shown reflects my contribution to frontend prototyping, interaction logic, and CMS integration.
project-2.contentMobile: This project focused on building interactive, motion-driven product experiences for a high-end consumer website. My work centered on frontend prototyping, component development, and integrating interactive content into a CMS-driven environment.
